mapper.select:
SELECT def_user.id, user_id, user_code, user_name, sex, def_user.avatar, phone, store_code, def_user.area_code, def_user.group_code, def_user.corp_code, def_user.modified_date, def_user.modifier, def_user.isactive, def_user.isonline, def_user.position, def_group.group_name, def_group.role_code, def_corp.corp_name FROM def_user,def_group,def_corp WHERE def_user.group_code = def_group.group_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_group.corp_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code
AND def_user.corp_code = #{corp_code}
AND (user_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR user_code LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR phone LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_corp.corp_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_group.group_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
AND def_group.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y' GROUP BY def_user.id ORDER BY def_user.id DESC

SELECT def_user.id, user_id, user_code, user_name, sex, def_user.avatar, phone, store_code, def_user.area_code, def_user.group_code, def_user.corp_code, def_user.modified_date, def_user.modifier, def_user.isactive, def_user.isonline, def_user.position, def_group.group_name, def_group.role_code, def_corp.corp_name FROM def_user,def_group,def_corp WHERE def_user.group_code = def_group.group_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_group.corp_code AND def_user.corp_code = #{corp_code} AND def_group.role_code < #{role_code} AND def_group.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y'
AND
def_user.store_code regexp #{item}
AND (def_user.user_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_user.user_code LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_user.phone LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_corp.corp_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') OR def_group.group_name LIKE concat('%',#{search_value},'%') )
GROUP BY def_user.id ORDER BY def_user.id DESC

SELECT def_user.id, user_id, user_code, user_name, sex, def_user.avatar, phone, email, position, birthday, password, login_time_recently, store_code, can_login, def_user.group_code, def_user.version_id, def_user.area_code, def_user.brand_code, def_user.corp_code, def_user.modified_date, def_user.modifier, def_user.created_date, def_user.creater, def_user.isactive, def_user.isonline, def_corp.corp_name, def_group.group_name, def_group.role_code FROM def_user,def_corp,def_group WHERE def_user.group_code = def_group.group_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_group.corp_code AND def_user.corp_code = def_corp.corp_code AND def_user.id = #{user_id} AND def_group.isactive = 'Y' AND def_corp.isactive = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM def_user WHERE phone = #{phone} AND isactive = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM def_user WHERE (phone = #{phone} or email = #{phone}) AND isactive = 'Y'

mapper.update:
UPDATE def_user
user_code = #{user_code},
avatar = #{avatar},
user_name = #{user_name},
sex = #{sex},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
birthday = #{birthday},
position = #{position},
corp_code = #{corp_code},
store_code = #{store_code},
group_code = #{group_code},
password = #{password},
login_time_recently = #{login_time_recently},
modified_date = #{modified_date},
modifier = #{modifier},
created_date = #{created_date},
creater = #{creater},
isactive = #{isactive},
can_login = #{can_login},
area_code = #{area_code},
isonline = #{isonline},
brand_code = #{brand_code},
version_id = #{version_id},
WHERE ID = #{id};
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) from def_user WHERE 1=1
AND created_date LIKE concat(#{created_date},'%')
